item.title: From Barcelona to Silicon Valley
item.description: The UPC ACM Student Chapter organizes a talk on Dec 20 at 12:45 in FIB. The talk will be given by Cristian Canton. Cristian canton is a computer scientist in the field of artificial intelligence, working as a researcher at Facebook, Menlo Park. He will talk about his vision an experience to encourage other people to do the same. Abstract: “Joining one of the many corporations or startups in the flourishing Silicon Valley market seems like a hard to reach dream.
